allprojects.title: Password Generator
allprojects.description: Password generator that gives set of mixed characters, numbers, and symbols as result. It taught me about loops, math objects, functions, and theme styling based on preference.

allprojects.title: Weather App
allprojects.description: Real-time weather app via openWeather API that provides weather information. It taught me about REST API, data request, and displaying response data on my app.

allprojects.title: Portfolio
allprojects.description: A bento style portfolio project to showcase my personal works. It taught me about flex grid, positioning and my first project made with framework/library and UI library.
